Title: Batman vs Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Crime, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Marly Halpern-Graser, James Tynion IV (based on the comic book by), Freddie Williams II (based on the comic book by), Bob Kane (Batman created by), Bill Finger (Batman created by), Kevin Eastman (Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles created by), Peter Laird (Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles created by), Paul Dini (Harley Quinn created by), Bruce Timm (Harley Quinn created by), Denny O'Neil (Ra's al Ghul created by), Neal Adams (Ra's al Ghul created by), Chuck Dixon (Bane created by), Doug Moench (Bane created by), Graham Nolan (Bane created by)
Actors: Troy Baker, Eric Bauza, Darren Criss, Kyle Mooney
Plot: Batman, Batgirl and Robin forge an alliance with The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles to fight against the Turtles' sworn enemy, The Shredder, who has teamed up with Ra's Al Ghul and The League Of Assassins.
